```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
require(easydox)
ZPData <- read.csv("C:/Users/royankur/OneDrive - Grinnell College/Desktop/ANOVA_STATS/zooplankton.csv")
names(ZPData)
str(ZPData)
```


```{r}
ZPData$Supp <- as.factor(ZPData$Supp)
ZPData$Lake <- as.factor(ZPData$Lake)



dox_main(ZP ~ Supp + Lake, ZPData, label = "Mean", ylim = c(30,90), text_size=12)
dox_inter(ZP ~ Supp + Lake, ZPData, label = "Mean", text_size=12)
dox_boxplot(ZP ~ Supp + Lake, ZPData, color = NULL, facet = NULL)
```
```{r}
dox_aov(ZP ~ Supp, ZPData)
dox_aov(ZP ~ Lake, ZPData)
```

```{r}
dox_aov(ZP ~ Supp + Lake, ZPData)
dox_aov(ZP ~ Supp * Lake, ZPData)
```



```{r}
dox_resid(ZP ~ Supp * Lake, ZPData, plot = "all", bins = 30)
```
